Articles.Content:
I will start by saying that I love this game, very new to it but highly addicted.

I'm a Student of Computer Games Design currently in the second year of my three year degree. I am closely following the development of this game, it has an epic proportion of potential. I'm currently working on a Machinima project, recreating the launch scene from Apollo 13 ready for submission on Friday.

Thanks for reading.

- Chris

Welcome to the forums!

Are you saying your re-creating it in the game, or like re-creating it in a movie?

I don't know much about things like programming so sorry if I misunderstood you at all

Welcome to the forums!

Are you saying your re-creating it in the game, or like re-creating it in a movie?

I don't know much about things like programming so sorry if I misunderstood you at all

Ahh, I'm recreating the scene in the game and then compiling the separate recordings via Adobe After Effects.
Sounds interesting! Welcome to the Forums!
Sounds great if you can could you post it in the forums after it is done?

Welcome to the community udk_lethal_d0se

Your machinima sounds interesting, don't forget to let us see it when it's done
Don't worry, I'll upload and post a link when it's done. It'll be my first little Machinima piece.

Ok, as requested here is the link to my somewhat short Machinima piece. Be gentle, it's my first attempt at making something from in-game footage.

KSP - Apollo 13 Machinima
